title: Use Duck Typing
starterCode:
# No inheritance needed - duck typing
class FileWriter:
    def write(self, data):
        print(f"Writing to file: {data}")

# Create DatabaseWriter with write() method

def save_data(writer, data):
    writer.write(data)

file_writer = FileWriter()
db_writer = DatabaseWriter()
save_data(file_writer, "test data")
save_data(db_writer, "test data")
